class.name: VisualShaderNodeParticleEmitter
class.brief_description: A base class for particle emitters.
class.description: Particle emitter nodes can be used in "start" step of particle shaders and they define the starting position of the particles. Connect them to the Position output port.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], the result of this emitter is projected to 2D space. By default it is [code]false[/code] and meant for use in 3D space.
